Name: Syzygy
About the game: Syzygy is an enigmatic game focused on the ability of morphing at will a square world into triangles and hexagons. Changing shapes to hinder your foes or create new paths, explore a nonlinear world of ideas filled with 80+ puzzles and find your way out.
